gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Magic 112, Hornets 92
gameRecap.excerpt: The Magic defeated the Hornets, 112-92. Cole Anthony led the way with 21 points, six rebounds and three assists for the Magic, while Paolo Banchero added 13 points and five assists in the victory. Brandon Miller tallied 21 points, seven rebounds and four 3PT FG for the Hornets in the losing effort.  The Magic improve to 41-28 on the season, while the Hornets fall to 17-52.
